page.title: 09 Health in Cwmbran
page.content: Health and welfare in our area is the responsibility of the Gwent Health Authority. There are 14 health agencies in our grid, of which one is a clinic, eleven are doctors,another is an optician,and the last is a hospital. The Llanfrechfa Grange Hospital is for the mentally handicapped and they cater for all age ranges. We are looked after in school by regular visits from the school nurse, doctor and dentists who keep regular checks on our physical growth. All children are medically examined when they first start school, i.e. 1st. year infants. Anyone who has something wrong is then checked until they are cleared.
